item.description:
Skyfall is the newest James Bond film, starring Daniel Craig, Judi Dench, and Javier Bardem. Bond's loyalty to M is tested as her past comes back to haunt her. As MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.

The movie opens on Friday, November 9. There's a showtime at 7:00 at Showcase Cinema in Worcester. Let's meet in the lobby at 6:30. If you need to reach me, my cell phone is 508-981-0455.

Anyone who wants to can join me for late food & drink afterwards, possibly at O'Connor's or 99.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Skyfall at 007 O'Clock
